# vDSP.WindowSequence.hanningNormalized

**Case**

The normalized-Hann window, used to reduce spectral leakage prior to discrete Fourier transform.

## Declaration

```swift
case hanningNormalized
```

## Related Documentation

- **Reducing spectral leakage with windowing**: Multiply signal data by window sequence values when performing transforms with noninteger period signals.
- **vDSP_hann_window**: Creates a single-precision Hann window.
- **vDSP_hann_windowD**: Creates a double-precision Hann window.

## Enumeration Cases

- **vDSP.WindowSequence.blackman**: The Blackman window, used to reduce spectral leakage prior to discrete Fourier transform.
- **vDSP.WindowSequence.hamming**: The Hamming window, used to reduce spectral leakage prior to discrete Fourier transform.
- **vDSP.WindowSequence.hanningDenormalized**: The denormalized-Hann window, used to reduce spectral leakage prior to discrete Fourier transform.
